author: Staff Reporter
text:
Efforts are under way to organise a three day national level water sports on Manapad coast in the district. The sports under the banner ‘Manapad Classic -2016’ would begin on February 12 and end on 14, Collector M. Ravikumar said here on Wednesday.

The participants would compete in six events such as sailing, surfing, kite boarding, kayaking, wind surfing and stand-up paddle. It would be organised in association with the Department of Tourism.

In the interest of spectators, yoga programme and training sessions for the likeminded people in some water sports were scheduled to be organised.
title: Water sports on Manapad coast
